content.question:
Ambiorix spreads revolt.

Hac victoria sublatustollo, -ere, sustuli, sublatus: elate Ambiorix statim cum equitatu in Aduatucos, qui erant eius regno finitimi, proficiscitur; neque noctem neque diem intermittitintermitto, -ere: cease, pause peditatumque subsequi iubet. Re demonstrata Aduatucisque concitatisconcito, -are: agitate, rouse up postero die in Nervios pervenit.

Bellum Gallicum 5.38

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
